title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 1000.2 - Procedure for listing of substances certified to director
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 1000.2 - Procedure for listing of substances certified to director

State Regulations
(a) The division shall give notice to the

Speaker of the Assembly and the Temporary President of the Senate of the
proposed listing in section 1000.3 [FN*] of this Part of a substance certified
to the director by the Commissioner of Health as having the capability of
causing physical and/or psychological dependence. The director shall consider
the advice and recommendation of the Legislature and shall hold a public
hearing prior to taking final action in so listing such substance. (b) The listing of a substance in section
1000.3 [FN*] of this Part shall, unless renewed, expire one year from the
effective date of such listing. [FN*] Text of section 1000.3 not filed with the Secretary of

State. [FN*] Text of section 1000.3 not filed with the Secretary of

State. Notes

comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
